tactic: rewrite -> (subAllCloseFrom L (arity L (inl r)) (termsMap (arity L (inl r)) ts ss)).

original: intros T r ts ss PairEq. unfold PairwiseEqual in PairEq. intros m0 eqMap f0 SysPrf1. unfold SysPrf in SysPrf1. unfold iffH. rewrite -> (subAllCloseFrom L (arity L (inl r)) (termsMap (arity L (inl r)) ts ss)). apply (addPairwiseEquals T (arity L (inl r)) ts ss PairEq (termsMap (arity L (inl r)) ts ss)). apply eqMap. apply SysPrf1.
